subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
Therapy and Rehabilitation
lead_paragraph: Stephen Strasburg, the former No. 1 overall draft pick, still has a blistering fastball nearly a year after undergoing reconstructive elbow surgery, but his control has been off.
snippet: Stephen Strasburg, the former No. 1 overall draft pick, still has a blistering fastball nearly a year after undergoing reconstructive elbow surgery, but his control has been off.
